title: Gyroscopes
alt: We didn't actually land on the moon -- it just looked like we did because of precession. Also, gyroscopes caused 9/11.
transcript:
[Cueball sits at a desk with a gyroscope in his hands. Text on top of the frame:]
Despite years of studying physics, I still find gyroscopes a little freaky.
[Cueball starts the gyroscope.]
Gyroscope: zzzzip[The gyroscope spins.]
Gyroscope: zzzzzz[Frameless panel, the gyroscope lifts into the air.][The gyroscope moves away from Cueball, still spinning.]
Gyroscope: GREETINGS, HUMAN.
